summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1247 for the improvement of Jackson Street, from First Avenue South to Railroad Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with brick and by constructing sewers, water mains and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13707, and levying and assessing the amounts therefor against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown on said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
